title: UDL and Blended Learning Practical Application Program for Pre-Service Mathematics Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic educational theory knowledge and mathematics subject matter expertise
context.additional_context: Course focused on strengthening practical competencies to apply UDL and blended learning in real classroom environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three ways to apply the UDL three principles (engagement, representation, action & expression) to secondary mathematics instruction
Learners can design a blended learning mathematics lesson plan that integrates online and offline activities
Learners can analyze LMS data to connect learner engagement patterns with UDL strategies in a report
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
